items: Kneel on the floor and hold the wheel rollout device with both hands, placing your hands shoulder-width apart on the handles.
Place the wheel on the floor in front of you, with your arms extended and your hands gripping the handles.
Slowly roll the wheel forward, keeping your core engaged and your back straight.
Continue rolling the wheel forward until your body is fully extended and your arms are overhead.
Hold this position for a few seconds, then slowly roll the wheel back towards your knees.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Strengthens the core muscles, including the abs, obliques, and lower back
Helps to prevent lower back pain and injury
Can be modified for different fitness levels
Assisted Wheel Rollout with Resistance Band
